description:
We all love the idea of outsourcing, but we usually fail dramatically.

We end up hating outsourcing sites, we end up wasting money and trowing away a lot of money and energy.

Learn how I produce around 30 apps per month with minimum amount of energy thanks to a different mindset towards app outsourcing .

This is not a magic solution type of course.... this is not a blueprint... this is an inspiration course that will go deeper than normal "outsourcing courses"

I'm not going to tell you to go to oDesk.

I'm not going to tell you what is an outsourcer...

I'm going to tell you why 99% of the things you are doing with outsourcing are costing you more money and energy and how you can change that today.

If you are looking to build a team, to create your own system... you need the right mindset... and in this course I'm 100% brutal and honest.

You want the truth? Let's talk about how to make more money with your apps while improving your lifestyle.
title: Outsourcing App Marketing and App Creation (Ninja Style)
